const NewsData = [ { 'id': 1, 'date': 'March 1, 2019', 'cover': "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Y_Mw07i9I1qN5x-wjfoR2BXMbypo5o5Jf3SghQB68Jr6IlXukdY8BWD0nDysJmEj31AYl1YyDVAuUVKfAzZyLeuPRneS1SYcgn2X3L2JfjpJq2SoMHKXRpzCm_q20S35wn6AKtz7", 'title': 'Fantuan Rush is now available', 'content': 'Fantuan’s latest addition, Fantuan Rush, is a game-changer for its users. The new service is designed to be the helping hand you need when time is just not on your side. It is, simply put, an incredibly easy to use errand service. Users can now order a courier to pick up and drop off any item they need transported (ex: documents, flowers, electronics, pre-bought/made food, etc.) within their neighbouring cities.

In addition, Fantuan Rush’s “Help Me Buy” feature allows users to have a courier go to a store that is not partnered with the company’s food delivery service (ex: 7-Eleven, Shoppers Drug Mart, Starbucks, Best Buy, etc.), buy whatever product they wish for and have it delivered to their door.


Fantuan Rush accepts coupons, like all Fantuan services, and is currently available in both English and Mandarin throughout Fantuan’s Canadian cities: Vancouver, Victoria, Edmonton, Calgary, Toronto and Montreal.


Fantuan Rush is an excellent example of the company’s actualization of its mission: “life made easier.” This service can help ease the lives of thousands of people, offering a solution to various daily struggles brought on by one thing nobody can get enough of time.

', 'user': 'user 1' }, { 'id': 2, 'date': 'January 14, 2019', 'cover': 'https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/k_FyBIxmwFmTcVLInNwPmKELwbXNlQG38nOmONYP8DozIA2p5NpJAM8bjC-Q1BW3tVtAEH0OfpSlUuo_hTRxaFKAY_dCY6YfcMoDAc_2xQFav4B8dTEdoYP4esXQgJlNdCdOTcP9', 'title': 'Fantuan wins Young Elite’s 2019 “YE Young Industry Leader” award', 'content': 'On November 29, 2019, the Young Elite Vancouver Business Association successfully hosted the ASPAC YE 2019 annual dinner in Vancouver. On the evening of the party, the Vancouver Young Youth Association presented awards to Vancouver’s Outstanding Young Start-ups and Outstanding Young Entrepreneurs. The Vancouver Youth League aims to build a stage for young Vancouver entrepreneurs. More than 300 local young talents gathered in Vancouver to celebrate their growth and share their achievements over the past year with the purpose of learning, making friends, mutual encouragement and development. 

Yaofei Feng, the CTO of Fantuan, was invited to accept the “YE Young Industry Leader” award, on behalf of Fantuan, and share his personal entrepreneurial experience, along with Fantuan’s development process with the guests of this event. This award reflects the Chinese community in Vancouver’s recognition of Fantuan as the leading Chinese entrepreneurial company in Vancouver. Since its establishment in 2014, Fantuan has dug deep into the technological life-services industry and is continuing to innovate and meet the needs of consumers and businesses. The company has also been actively giving back to the community for a long time, providing overseas youth with a platform for career development in the internet industry. 

 

The award was created by the Vancouver Youth League in 2017. Every year in Vancouver, about 30 representatives, people or businesses from various industries are included in the candidate list. “YE Young Industry Leader” not only requires the nominated company to have a widely recognized performance and social responsibility, but also requires the candidate to have a bold vision and unique understanding and judgment of the world’s macro-structures. Those who have been selected as “YE Young Industry Leaders” need to actively serve various industries in Vancouver, have an innovative spirit and actively contribute to help create a brighter future for the local community in Vancouver.


', 'user': 'user 2' }, { 'id': 3, 'date': 'December 1, 2019', 'cover': "https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/ub-zmgvekXcQMdi7gP1sJPLRZaTIgYRPMZMr3Au8G0Rb-ntq8dQlIavqpjaZJ0MBLoZs5_bvQaoKVzspzcparLtrbgHBj-TMLAn8Ovn3pHo0wr0PK_JTnLC3XXnLeCrPj26V77Yj", 'title': 'Fantuan wins EDGE Awards’ “Most Potential Investment Enterprise of the Year”', 'content': 'News news news news news news news news news. News news news news news. News news news news news.', 'user': 'user 4' }, { 'id': 5, 'date': 'January 1, 2019', 'cover': require('../../images/text.jpg'), 'title': 'Fantuan Reviews Launched in Vancouver', 'content': 'News news news news news news news news news. News news news news news. News news news news news.', 'user': 'user 5' }, ] export default NewsData;
